experience.summary: Built a real-time algae stage monitoring system with time-series forecasting and operational dashboards.
bullets: Developed and deployed an LSTM model trained on 1,400+ sinusoidal pH readings; achieved 92.4% accuracy (MAE: 0.12) for 30-step forecasting.
Integrated Raspberry Pi with EZO-pH sensor to stream data every 10s; triggered predictions via Flask endpoints.
Deployed on AWS with anomaly detection and support for multi-sensor expansion.
Built automated live charts, real-time reports, and MIS dashboards using Chart.js and JavaScript to improve decision-making.

bullets: Built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Chart.js, and Bootstrap.
Designed interactive charts, real-time performance KPIs, and dashboards.
Optimized UX and data pipelines to support 500+ revenue data entries with scalable analytics.

bullets: Engineered model using Python/XGBoost; tuned features and hyperparameters.

Implemented data visualization and advanced analytics for insights.
